title: Refusal Event
description: Canonical schema for recording a refusal event in an AI decision pathway.

event_id.description: Globally unique identifier for the refusal event.

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp when the refusal was triggered.

decision_id.description: Identifier linking this refusal to the original AI decision pathway.

triggered_by.description: User or process ID that triggered the refusal.

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction code relevant to the decision (e.g., ISO 3166-1 alpha-2).

pathway_before.description: Description or code of the decision pathway before refusal.

pathway_after.description: Description or code of the alternative pathway taken after refusal.

penalty_flag.description: True if refusal resulted in a disadvantage; should always be false if compliant.

reviewer_id.description: ID of reviewer or oversight entity verifying the refusal.

outcome.description: Final result after refusal pathway was completed.
